changeSet.sql: lock table PROCESS_LOGS; update PROCESS_LOGS s set INSTANCE_CREATED_AT = (select CREATED_AT from PROCESS_QUEUE q where q.INSTANCE_ID = s.INSTANCE_ID);

changeSet.author: ibodrov@gmail.com
changeSet.createView: select INSTANCE_ID, INSTANCE_CREATED_AT, coalesce(max(upper(CHUNK_RANGE)), 0) as UPPER_BOUND from PROCESS_LOGS group by INSTANCE_ID, INSTANCE_CREATED_AT

changeSet.author: ibodrov@gmail.com
changeSet.createView: select INSTANCE_ID, INSTANCE_CREATED_AT, max(upper(CHUNK_RANGE)) as SIZE from PROCESS_LOGS group by INSTANCE_ID, INSTANCE_CREATED_AT
